message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product! It's one of our top-of-the-line items, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take it off my hands for $100?
I'd like to take it off your hands for $100, thank you for the offer!

I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if this one is as good as the previous one. I'd like to pass for now.
